input.sentences: my friends and i went to the beach yesterday .
the guys were acting crazy and i got a picture of them .
the water was cold but felt good because the weather was so hot .
my boyfriend and i needed this time away from work and obligations .
the gorgeous sunset was the best ending to a great day !
output.sentences: The boys have gathered for their annual beach pilgrimage.
Fun abounds as they test the frigid waters.
The water is not felt in their inebriated race against the rising sun.
Strangers stop and take selfies with the Gods of the Beach.
They admire the sunset and return to the hotel for free breakfast.
